turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Okay, I need to check my checking account balance. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! Please confirm your identity by providing the last four digits of your social security number and your date of birth.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Ugh, I hate doing this every time. Okay, the last four are 1234 and my birthday is 01/01/1990. Now, what's my balance?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance:
Thank you. Your checking account balance is $2,345.67.  Also, I see a pending transaction for $150 from 'Online Retailer X'.

Can I assist with anything else today? I'm still working on my ability to predict future account fluctuations though, so I apologize if my advice there is not so useful.

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Alright, thanks. One more thing, can you tell me what the fees are for international wire transfers? I might need to send some money abroad soon.
